website_summaries.verdict: One of the highest quality, trademarked co-sleepers on the market that can be easily converted to a stand-alone bassinet.
pros: Well-made, has excellent adjustability, and offers a sturdy and secure sleeping space for infants
Easy to transport for travel or even to another room with its wheels
Smart design that doesn't take up space within parents' beds, and a stylish design as well
cons: Some feel that the mattress quality could be improved, and the wheels could be sturdier

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate photo
customer_reviews.text: Although the photo depicts a gray bassinet with white trim, the actual bassinet is gray with brown trim. It is much less cute. I would like to return it, but do not have time -- so letting others know.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Essential baby equipment for nursing moms
customer_reviews.text: This made night-time feedings so easy—why oh why didn’t I have this for the first two children? Our baby outgrew it by 7 months, and I was very sad for him to move into his crib. It was perfect to have him within arm’s reach and made nursing easier even in the beginning, when he ate 4 times at night. I want all breastfeeding moms to have this!!
customer_reviews.author: Mel S

customer_reviews.title: Great bassinet, crappy mattress
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept, the mobility hate the mattress and so does my little one. A few minutes after putting her down in it she's up . It's too thin and uncomfortable. We have another bassinet that's memory foam and she sleep great in it. I get they want the mattress to be firm but this is crap. I'm still looking for a better mattress and the dimensions are hard to find 31 x 17.5x 1.5. If anyone found a memory foam mattress that is better please let me know.
customer_reviews.author: sharona

customer_reviews.title: Great for a bassinet on wheels.
customer_reviews.text: Used daily since birth. Love it. We wheel it back and forth from beside our bed into the living room for daytime naps. When you push it, it does shift the bars a few inches before it starts to move. So it’s not a rock solid sturdy bassinet. But it’s still safe. Not meant to be a solid stationary item, and it’s comprised of metal bars, so I think it’s forgivable. It’s not like it’s rickety. We love this bassinet!
customer_reviews.author: Karen J

customer_reviews.title: Excellent co-sleeper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a mom who was having a planned c-section. She is thrilled with being able to easily reach her baby from her bed. The bar is also sturdy enough to help her get into and out of bed. This is a great choice, especially post c-section. My reviews are always honest; I do not receive any free or discounted merchandise. Since I rely on reviews when I shop, I try to pay it forward and help you shop, too.
customer_reviews.author: Mom B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted now I don't worry about co sleeping, however he didn't like the pad, I folded a blanket over the pad (under the cover). He loves it and sleeps through the night. Easy to setup. The cover is just a changing pad cover I got from Walmart and it fits perfectly. The only bad thing I didn't expect was that on the pictures above it shows the crib gray and white trim, the one I got is gray and brown trim.
customer_reviews.author: Lisette

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and adjusts for higher beds
customer_reviews.text: Just put my clear-vue co sleeper together and so far it is great! It is high enough to fit the height of my bed, which is about 29 inches. Assembly was relatively simple, I did it by myself at 6 months pregnant in about 40 mins and it seems very sturdy. I’ve done lots of research on which co sleeper to get and I’m happy with my decision to purchase this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jewlz

customer_reviews.title: Great co-sleeper, especially for csection recovery
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great bassinet. My son has been sleeping in it since day one at home. I love the mesh, and that one side goes down. I can see my baby every time I wake up at night. Also, worked great for me after having a csection. I can reach my baby and nurse without getting out of my bed. The storage compartment in the bottom is great. I put some IKEA storage dividers down there and it keeps it organized. My only complaint so far is that the mattress is very thin. I think baby would be sleeping even better in it if it was a little softer.
customer_reviews.author: Ksenia

customer_reviews.title: A great sleeper for keeping baby close throughout the night
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this sleeper. I wish that we had gotten it with our first child. This sleeper is at a nice height so that I don’t have to bend down to pick up the baby. This was especially helpful just after my c-section and still is a nice feature. I loved being able to put the side down and see him throughout the night. Now that he is a few months old, he still sleeps in it but I have the side up.
customer_reviews.author: Strawberry123

customer_reviews.title: Great sleep option
customer_reviews.text: Great sleep option. Better than our last bassinet that was given as a gift and around the same price. Loved the ability to check on my LO across the room rather than having to stand over them. Able to even see the rise and fall of my LO chest which helps my concerns over SIDS. Also, the cosleeper definitely is wider, longer, and can handle more weight which is our bassinet was able to.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable Co-Sleeper!!
customer_reviews.text: This co-sleeper is grrrrreat! It fits right up against our bed for easier night feedings - & the wheels make it a breeze to move around the house during nap times. We love the storage at the bottom & on the sides. Sometimes when rolling it seems to wobble, but my husband says it’s still sturdy as he put it together himself. Finding sheets to fit the mattress is a bit difficult. But overall, we like!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Love this bassinet!
customer_reviews.text: As other reviews stated, I received a grey and brown version instead of brown and white. I don't really mind though, both look nice. Anyway, I've been using it for a month now for my newborn and absolutely love it. The drop side is super convenient for middle of the night wakings/feedings and the mesh sides give me peace of mind for when she starts rolling. I love the pockets on the side. I wish I had this with my first baby.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Vickerman

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy this again!
customer_reviews.text: We love this little bassinet. We don't use it as a co-sleeper but we do keep it near our bed next to the wall in our room. Little guy sleeps well in it. For him, we've placed a wedge incliner under the mattress and a soft blanket over the mattress so he's sleeping on an incline and a more cushy surface. He's almost four months old and a little less than 12 pounds now, and it's still working great for our/his needs.
customer_reviews.author: Song of Joy

customer_reviews.title: New born recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient if you have hardwood floors and life in an apartment or have one floor. We have a new born and are really happy with it moving it from room to room. Be ready to have an hour to assemble it as the instructions are not straight forward and it’s a not as sturdy as I’d like it to be but everyone is happy with the other pros so it’s ok
customer_reviews.author: Gil

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for nighttime sleep and daytime baby-wrangling
customer_reviews.text: Been using this bassinet for about 2 weeks now, and we're very happy with it. The ability to wheel it around the house is a definite plus, and it is easy to hook and unhook from the bed. If you want an easily height-adjustable bassinet, this is not your choice. But honestly, once we got it adjusted to the correct height for the bed, we haven't felt the need to adjust it further. The side pockets are also quite handy for storing nighttime supplies like burp cloths, phone, lanolin, &c. Construction feels durable so far.
customer_reviews.author: Drennen

customer_reviews.title: Decent sleeper, lots of velcro-over fabric to hide imprecisions in construction
customer_reviews.text: The sleeper does the job, the mattress is soft (but not too soft to be a worry for breathing), and is sturdy enough for my newborn. Nothing you'd hand down to the next generation, but I imagine it would hold up for another child if the wife is up for it. The construction is basically a bunch of plastic lined up with fabric used to cover the rough connections. Fair deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I bought this for our daughter. She keeps it right next to her bed. She loves that it has multiple purposes for her and her baby
customer_reviews.author: carrie

customer_reviews.title: Great use!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bassinet! The wheels make it very convenient. I bought another one for my mom for when she babysits. It is durable.
customer_reviews.author: RbkMebarak

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: I did countless hours looking for a bassinet, this one fit the bill for everything I was looking for. It has wheels to maneuver through the house, is high enough that I don't have to bend too low, looks nice, appears to be sturdy, has netting around to provide good visibility and breathability. While our baby isn't here just yet, any day now, I am hopeful he will have a good night's sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew H.

customer_reviews.title: Rock hard mattress otherwise good
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty wobbly when rolled around and the mattress pad is rock hard. We folded 2 thick blankets to make it soft enough to lay in. Otherwise it's a great co sleeper, the height adjusts pretty high for a raised king size bed and the storage on the bottom is a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. C.

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This is a great solution for parents who want to safely extend their bed to be able to reach and grab their baby. It's good becuase you don't always have to get out of bed. I also like it because you can roll the bassinet around the house. I did not have that option before so this is a big plus. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love this little bedside bassinet.. it’s one of the best purchases we’ve made with our newborn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: well-reviewed, and I can see why!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bassinet based on the good reviews it received on wirecutter and because of limited space in our bedroom. It was very nice - sturdy and pretty straightforward to put together. One person can do it thought it is definitely easier with two (especially the early steps when you're lining up the parts). Once the main pieces are on, everything else velcros together to make sure there are no exposed metal parts. We used this until ~3 months when our baby got a little too big/mobile for the bassinet.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Different color then the photo
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked to open it and realize the picture doesn't match the product. I was expecting a grey and white cosleeper, but it's actually grey and cream. Other than the color mix up it's exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Arms Reach Co-Sleeper
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, move from room to room, and it looks great. Makes breastfeeding at night much easier and we feel better being able to see our baby from our bed.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Love my co-sleeper!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Arms Reach cosleeper. I love the design and how easy it is to assemble. We had it up and functional in 20 minutes. The screws are already built, so don’t go looking for them!
customer_reviews.author: L. Bridges

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Baby slept in this the first 4 months and it was great! Also rolled very quietly so baby never woke up while rolling him into another room
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Havent used it with baby yet but i do love this bassinet! It doesnt have a crease in the middle of the mattress pad like most other bassinets, and the pad is actually somewhag soft unlike others I've felt! It fits perfectly next to my bed and the height adjustment is easy to do, none of the hard parts of the frame are exposed thanks to the velcro padding around everything. Very happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Linehan

customer_reviews.title: Great! Could be sturdier.
customer_reviews.text: This product is how I expected it to be. It is exactly as described and looks like the pictures provided. It isn’t as sturdy as I would like, but it’s to be expected. It is only safe for a baby up to six months, if your baby grows at a normal rate. I was overall very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this since my son was 1 month. He is now 6 months old and we still use it. Best purchase I made!
customer_reviews.author: Dara Staggs

customer_reviews.title: Great bassinet!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a high bed like us, this is the bassinet for you! We looked and looked and this was the only one that would put our baby up to the high or our bed. It's made very well. He's easy to move around the house and he sleeps good in it. It's so nice being able to see him in the night. Def recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Truesdell

customer_reviews.title: Review prior to use with newborn
customer_reviews.text: Writing this review prior to using with our newborn who is expected shortly. Bassinet was easy to assemble with two people, seems to move around on its wheels well and is sturdy while empty. We are happy with the purchase so far and are looking forward to using with our newborn soon. 4 out of 5 only since we have not used fully yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, helpful bassinet to keep baby close during the night
customer_reviews.text: Easy, convenient, safe way to keep baby next to me through the night. Downside: my son hates the mattress. Will not sleep on it at all, so we're using a contoured changing pad that happens to fit nicely for now.. will have to come up with something else when he's big enough to roll over.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Great bassinet
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with it. Love the storage on the bottom. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Catherine

customer_reviews.title: It’s safe
customer_reviews.text: I really liked that is pretty big and you can adjust the height on it . Also like the safety cord it comes with so you can secure it next to your bed
customer_reviews.author: juan m hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Super easy assembly. Nice size. Still waiting for baby’s arrival....
customer_reviews.author: LalaReviews

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This bassinet was easy to put together. It fits perfectly with our bed and gives me comfort knowing our baby will be safe inside next to us. We have dogs who sleep on the bed and I am at ease knowing there is a good barrier between baby and them.
customer_reviews.author: Saundra

customer_reviews.title: Great bassinet
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bassinet. Very sturdy. A little hard to find sheets that fit correctly. Still trying to get the Armsreach website to work so I can order a few sets of sheets
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: We love this product super easy to assemble, and love being able to keep baby so close to the bed that you don’t have to get physically out of the bed to breast feed. The pockets and extra storage make keeping essentials nice and close
customer_reviews.author: Tawnie

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and use bassinet
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and move around. Overall, looks like a good bassinet. Comes with a mattress, however it is thin. Purchased based on a lot of positive reviews and best of lists from trusted sources. Looking forward to using it.
customer_reviews.author: Rejena

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this co sleeper! I've used one with all 5 of my children and can say without a doubt that this is the best on the market!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. The locking wheels are great for swinging it away from the bed in the middle of the night. The storage area on the bottom is very helpful for late night changings!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Kirschner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our preemie
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to put together and it feels very sturdy. Our preemie loves sleeping in it so I can't complain!
customer_reviews.author: Nghia Tran

customer_reviews.title: Soldering kit for small work
customer_reviews.text: Great product and gave me the opportunity to finish up easily
customer_reviews.author: Gary H. Chasen

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put together and seems very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It was so easy to put together and the instructions are extremely clear! Seems very sturdy and cannot wait to use it
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Miller

customer_reviews.title: Solid bassinet
customer_reviews.text: Love the ability to see baby clearly. The one downside is the crib sheet is very easily stained by spit up.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Does what we need it to do
customer_reviews.text: Seems very sturdy and well protected. Great that it can be assembled as a bassinet or as a co-sleeper. Very sturdy with good storage space. Looks more attractive than we expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Hui

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this thing-I can move it wherever I need and everything stores neatly underneath!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bassinet !
customer_reviews.text: After so much search of which bassinet to get I finally decided on this one and I’m glad I did it’s just what I was looking/expecting for. I can’t wait for my baby to be born to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I liked it a lot too bad my baby grew out of it too soon. But great for diaper storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stater bassinet bed for new born!
customer_reviews.text: Good bed second one we bought for last two new grandsons.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Davis

customer_reviews.title: Fine product
customer_reviews.text: A fine product given its price. Keep in mind that the material is quite similar to that of a tent. Easy and fast to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my newborn and love it! Easy to assemble and seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Carder

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Bedside Bassinet
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, large storage compartment, sturdy and easy to move.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Hanson

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: It isn’t what I was expecting but I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Flo

product_meta.title: Arms Reach Clear-Vue Co-Sleeper Bassinet - Grey
product_meta.description: The Clear-Vue™ Co-Sleeper® was conceived to allow maximum visibility. With the The Clear-Vue™ Co-Sleeper® you can see your baby at all times. Like all of our Co-Sleeper® bedside bassinets, the Clear-Vue™ Co-Sleeper® allows you and your baby to sleep comfortably next to each other from the moment your baby arrives. This bedside bassinet enables you to reach over and draw your baby close for feeding, comforting and bonding. The innovative design has built in leg extensions to adjust to varying bed heights, and four castor wheels for easy mobility around the house. This bassinet also has the convenience of a large attached storage basket. The Clear-Vue™ Co-Sleeper® brand bassinet is the ideal sleep solution for any concerned parent.
feature_bullets: Two modes: Bedside Sleeper & Freestanding Bassinet
Large attached storage basket, Breathable Sides and built-in leg extensions - wheels to move around
Includes: Mattress, Fitted Sheet, Travel bag, Nylon Strap and resistant Plate & 2 Wheels
Allows Maximum Visibility of baby at all times
Endorsed by the most influential pediatricians, OB/GYN's and child care experts in the world

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars141 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
